name: Worldy Cup
description: Retro futuristic arcade football. On regular screen and in VR. It's like you're inside a futuristic version of an 8bit world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i7-870 equivalent or greater Memory: 4GB GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 460 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: requirements for playing in non VR
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: recommended requirements for playing in VR
